item.title: Linux cpp put Backtrace
item.description: 获取Backtrace #include <execinfo.h> /* Store up to SIZE return address of the current program state in ARRAY and return the exact number of values stored. */ int backtrace(void **array, int size); /* Return names of functions from the backtrace list in ARRAY in a newly malloc()ed memory block. */ char **backtrace_symbols(void *const *array, int size); /* This function is similar to backtrace_symbols() but it writes the result immediately to a file.
